scripts.name: Context Generator
scripts.description: Generates Rhino 3dm file with 3d geometry of the context, streets and buildings. Useful for urban design and site analysis. User needs to provide the location.

outputs.name: context_model_3dm
outputs.description: Rhino model file with 3d geometry of the context, streets and buildings

examples: Run Context Generator for Borough Market, London
Generate urban context for Times Square, New York
Create 3D context model for Eiffel Tower, Paris
Build context geometry for Brandenburg Gate, Berlin
